# nxos_save_config (Action)

This action is used to save the config which is the equivalent of doing a `copy running-config startup-config` in the device CLI.

## Example Usage

```terraform
action "nxos_save_config" "example" {
  config {
    device = "switch1"
  }
}
```

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
